text: I am Yeison, an independent barber growing my small business which is called 1999champcutz. I know how hard it can be to find a great barber. 1999champcutz will offer you the best experience with a great work ethic. I am consistent with my work and am always prioritizing my clients' time. ﻿1999champcutz is always keeping up with the latest trends and techniques in the barbering industry to offer the best service. First time clients will get a detailed consultation in order to achieve their desired look. I look to build client relationships and develop strong connections through attentive listening and personalized service. ﻿﻿My goal is to always provide high quality services to my customers. ﻿﻿As well as to be loyal, honest, trustworthy, reliable and a professional barber. ﻿﻿I treat all my customers equally, and with respect and dignity.
